snippet: The announcement comes after talks between Iran and world powers about its nuclear work and underlines Iran’s continued refusal to bow to Western pressure to curb its nuclear program.
abstract: Iran says it is building about 3,000 advanced uranium-enrichment centrifuges; announcement comes after talks between Iran and world powers about its nuclear work and underlines Iran’s continued refusal to bow to Western pressure to curb its nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: The announcement comes after talks between Iran and world powers about its nuclear work and underlines Iran’s continued refusal to bow to Western pressure to curb its nuclear program.
